recon.title: Reconciliation
recon.subtitle: Resolve unknown references, duplicates, and mismatched deposits to keep ledgers clean.
recon.momo.title: MoMo statement ingest
recon.momo.subtitle: Apply validation masks, review parser feedback, and ingest clean deposits.
recon.momo.note1: Drag-and-drop MTN CSV exports. The wizard normalises Kigali timestamps, phone numbers, and amounts automatically.
recon.momo.note2: Parser feedback highlights duplicates, missing references, and invalid rows before anything is posted.
recon.momo.note3: Only validated rows reach Supabase; duplicates and bad records are held back for manual follow-up.
recon.momo.assignSacco: Assign yourself to a SACCO to enable statement ingestion.
recon.sms.title: SMS inbox
recon.sms.subtitle: Latest MoMo SMS messages captured by the gateway and ready for parsing.
recon.exceptions.title: Exceptions

recon.ai.title: AI suggestion
recon.ai.noConfident: No confident suggestion. Review alternatives or assign manually.
ikimina.import.title: Ikimina import
ikimina.import.uploadHelp: Upload a CSV exported from your SACCO system. Include column headers in the first row.
ikimina.import.dropOrBrowse: Drop CSV here or click to browse
ikimina.import.templateColumns: Template columns: full_name, msisdn, member_code. You can adjust mapping in the next step.
ikimina.import.dragMapping: Drag a CSV column chip into each required field below.
ikimina.import.previousMapping: Previous mapping detected for this header set. Fields applied automatically.
ikimina.import.payloadNote: Payload is sent to the secure-import-members edge function. Ensure it is deployed and reachable.
auth.enroll.scanMessage: Scan the QR code or use the secret with Google Authenticator.
auth.challenge.prompt: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app.
auth.errors.rateLimit: Too many attempts. Try again later.
auth.enroll.verifiedNextCode: Authenticator verified. Enter the next 6-digit code to finish signing in.
auth.email.label: Staff email
auth.password.label: Password
auth.enroll.intro: Before continuing, add “SACCO+” to the Google Authenticator app.
auth.enroll.qrAlt: Scan this QR code with Google Authenticator to add SACCO+
auth.enroll.scanInstruction: Open Google Authenticator, tap the + button, and choose “Scan a QR code”.
auth.enroll.step1: Open Google Authenticator and tap the + button.
auth.enroll.step2: Scan the QR code above or choose “Enter a setup key” and copy the code below.
auth.enroll.step3: Give it the name SACCO+, confirm, then enter the next two 6-digit codes.
auth.enroll.enterTwoCodes: Enter the next two codes generated after adding the account.
auth.backup.title: Backup codes
auth.backup.storeInfo: Store these codes securely. Each one can be used once if you lose access to the authenticator app.
recon.guidance.missingReference: Add a SACCO.IKIMINA(.MEMBER) reference before posting.
recon.guidance.needsMember: Link to a member to clear unallocated funds.
recon.guidance.duplicate: Compare with existing transactions sharing this reference.
recon.guidance.manualReview: Review supporting documents before updating status.
recon.guidance.parserFailure: Fix the SMS format and retry the parser or assign manually.
recon.guidance.msisdnMismatch: Capture the sender MSISDN from statements for future auto-matching.
recon.guidance.lowConfidence: Double-check amount and reference before marking posted.
statement.upload.intro: Upload bank or MoMo statements exported as CSV or Excel. Include a header row.
statement.upload.dropCta: Drop file here or click to browse
statement.upload.requiredCols: Required columns: date, transaction id, amount, msisdn. Optional: reference.
statement.sms.intro: Paste one or more MoMo SMS messages. Each line should be a full SMS.
statement.map.intro: Drag a column chip into each required field below.
statement.preview.intro: Preview the first rows. Invalid entries are highlighted.
statement.preview.noRefHint: No reference · will require manual allocation
statement.preview.duplicatesHint: Duplicate txn IDs detected. They will be skipped by the importer.
profile.mfa.disableHint: Provide a valid code to disable two-factor

ikimina.statements.emptyDescription: Statements will appear as transactions post.

ikimina.settings.readOnlyHint: Only system admins or the assigned SACCO can edit these settings.
admin.invite.helper1: Invited users receive a one-time password via email; they must sign in with that password and change it immediately.
admin.invite.helper2: Assign managers for full control, staff for day-to-day updates, and viewers for read-only dashboards.
profile.security.title: Account security
profile.security.subtitle: Manage your password and authenticator preferences.
profile.mfa.title: Two-factor authentication
profile.mfa.enforced: Multi-factor verification is required on every sign-in. Use any active channel below.
profile.mfa.prompt: Turn on an authenticator app or email codes to protect your account.
profile.mfa.scanTitle: Scan or tap to add authenticator
profile.mfa.codesHint: Enter two consecutive codes to confirm.
profile.mfa.backup.title: Backup codes
profile.mfa.backup.hint: Each code can be used once. Store them securely and do not share.
profile.channels.passkey.label: Passkey approval
profile.channels.passkey.desc: Use device-bound approvals from compatible laptops or phones.
profile.channels.totp.label: Authenticator app
profile.channels.totp.desc: 6-digit codes from Google Authenticator or similar.
profile.channels.email.label: Email one-time code
profile.channels.email.desc: 6-digit code delivered to your staff inbox for sign-in.
profile.channels.audit.title: Recent email code activity
profile.trusted.title: Trusted devices
profile.trusted.subtitle: Devices that can skip MFA when the trusted cookie is present.
profile.trusted.revokeHint: Revoke devices you no longer control.
auth.challenge.emailPrompt: Use your authenticator app or request a code by email.
auth.challenge.passkeyPrompt: Approve with your passkey or enter a 6-digit authenticator code.
auth.challenge.passkeyMulti: Approve with your passkey or use the authenticator app/email code.
auth.challenge.passkeyEmail: Approve with your passkey or enter the code we emailed you.
auth.challenge.passkeySubtitle: Approve with your device's screen lock instead of entering a code.
auth.challenge.emailOnly: Enter the code we emailed you.
auth.errors.noPasskeys: Passkeys are not configured for this account.
auth.email.sent: We sent a security code to your email.
auth.email.rateLimited: Check your inbox or try again shortly.
auth.email.activeLimit: Too many active codes. Use an existing code or wait until it expires.
auth.email.expired: No active email code. Request a new one.
auth.email.challenge: Enter the code we emailed you. Codes expire in 10 minutes.
profile.passkeys.title: Passkeys
profile.passkeys.subtitle: Use device-bound approvals instead of typing codes.
profile.passkeys.unsupported: Passkeys are not supported in this browser.
profile.passkeys.empty: No passkeys registered yet. Add one from a compatible device.
